mapper.insert: insert into sc_part (PART_NO, PART_NAME, PART_MODEL, PART_PRICE, PART_COST, PART_QTY, PART_ID, DIVISION_ID, PART_INFO, PART_IMAGEPATH) values (#{no},#{name},#{modelName},#{price},#{cost},#{qty},#{partStatus.id},#{division.id},#{info},#{imagepath})
mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over (order by A.PART_NO desc) as rn, A.PART_NO no, A.PART_NAME name, A.PART_MODEL modelName, A.PART_PRICE price, A.PART_COST cost, A.PART_QTY qty, B.PART_STATUS "partStatus.status", C.DIVISION_NAME "division.name", A.PART_INFO info, A.PART_IMAGEPATH imagepath from sc_part A, PART_STATUS B, sc_division C where A.part_id = B.part_id and A.division_id = C.division_id and A.division_id = #{divisionId} ) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex}
select count(*) from sc_part where division_id = #{value}

select A.PART_NO no, A.PART_NAME name, A.PART_MODEL modelName, A.PART_PRICE price, A.PART_COST cost, A.PART_QTY qty, B.PART_ID "partStatus.id", B.PART_STATUS "partStatus.status", C.DIVISION_ID "division.id", C.DIVISION_NAME "division.name", C.CATEGORY_ID "division.category.id", C.CATEGORY_NAME "division.category.name", A.PART_INFO info, A.PART_IMAGEPATH imagepath from sc_part A, PART_STATUS B, (select A.DIVISION_ID, A.DIVISION_NAME, A.CATEGORY_ID, B.CATEGORY_NAME from SC_DIVISION A, SC_CATEGORY B where A.CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID)C where A.PART_ID = B.PART_ID and A.DIVISION_ID = C.DIVISION_ID and A.PART_NO = #{value}

select A.PART_NO no, A.PART_NAME name, A.PART_MODEL modelName, A.PART_PRICE price, A.PART_COST cost, A.PART_QTY qty, B.PART_STATUS "partStatus.status", C.DIVISION_NAME "division.name", A.PART_INFO info, A.PART_IMAGEPATH imagepath from sc_part A, PART_STATUS B, (select A.DIVISION_ID, A.DIVISION_NAME from SC_DIVISION A, SC_CATEGORY B where A.CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID)C where A.PART_ID = B.PART_ID and A.DIVISION_ID = C.DIVISION_ID
